name: Clean it together!
description:
This game is part of #SeaJam, it's a local co-op game about cleaning the ocean together with a friend, playable with a twin-stick gamepad.

Thank you to A Beginner's Dev Vlog on youtube

Their channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLwbswdZR1FrvSLjbRMo8Dw

The game was made during the last 5 or 6 days of the jam and the idea behind it was to try and implement not only the theme of "Sea" but "Team" too.
